snippet: Originally commissioned by the Steppenwolf Theater, the one-act will play three days as part of the London Literature Festival.
abstract: Originally commissioned by the Steppenwolf Theater, the one-act will play three days as part of the London Literature Festival.

headline.main: DeLillo Play on Global Warming to Receive Premiere in London
headline.print_headline: DeLillo Play on Climate To Be Staged in London
